overview:
Samuel D. (Dee) Jones is executive vice president, chief financial officer and treasurer for SuperMedia. As the primary liaison with the investment community, Jones is responsible for investor relations programs; for strategic communications with shareholders, both institutional and individual; for leading the mergers and acquisitions team in financially beneficial transactions; and for managing the company’s external communications function.

Prior to his current assignment, Jones was executive director - financial reporting and analysis and mergers and acquisitions for Verizon Information Services (VIS). Jones has also served as executive director - sales support for VIS’ International operations.

Jones began his career as manager - cost accounting for GTE Southwest. He advanced through positions of increasing responsibility including, manager - regulatory accounting for GTE Central and director - general accounting and financial reporting for GTE Directories. He holds a bachelor’s and a master’s degree in accounting from Angelo State University.
